1.verse: Ilizwi likaYehova elafika kuHoseya unyana kaBheri, ngemihla kaUziya, kaYotam, ka-Ahazi, kaHezekiya, ookumkani bakwaYuda;  ngemihla kaYarobheham unyana kaYowashe, ukumkani wakwaSirayeli.

2.verse: Ukuqala kokuthetha kukaYehova noHoseya, wathi uYehova kuHoseya, Yiya uzeke umfazi wobuhenyu nabantwana bobuhenyu;  ngokuba ilizwe lihenyuze kakhulu, lemka kuYehova.

3.verse: Waya ke, wazeka uGomere intombi kaDibhelayim; wakhawula,  wamzalela unyana.

4.verse: UYehova wathi kuye, Mthiye igama lokuba nguYizereli; ngokuba kusaya kuba ngumzuzwana, ndiwavelele amagazi akwaYizereli kwindlu kaYehu, ndibuphelise ubukumkani bendlu kaSirayeli.

5.verse: Kuya kuthi ngaloo mini ndisaphule isaphetha sakwaSirayeli entilini yaseYizereli.

6.verse: Waphinda wakhawula, wazala intombi. Wathi uYehova kuye,  Yithiye igama lokuba nguAkenzelwanga-mfesane ngokuba andiyi kuba saphinda ndiyenzele mfesane indlu kaSirayeli,  ndingabaxoleli nokubaxolela.

7.verse: Ndiya kuyenzela imfesane ke indlu kaYuda, ndibasindise ngoYehova uThixo wabo, ndingabasindisi ngasaphetha, nangakrele,  nangamfazwe, ngamahashe, nangabamahashe.

8.verse: Akumlumla ke uAkenzelwanga-mfesane, wakhawula wazala unyana.

9.verse: Wathi uYehova, Mthiye igama lokuba nguAsibantu-bam; ngokuba aningabantu bam, nam andiyi kuba ngowenu.

10.verse: Ke inani loonyana bakaSirayeli liya kuba ngangentlabathi yaselwandle, engalinganiswayo, engabalwayo; kuthi endaweni yokuba kuthiwe kubo, Aningabantu bam, kusuke kuthiwe kubo,  Ningoonyana bakaThixo ophilileyo.

11.verse: Bohlanganisana ndawonye oonyana bakaYuda noonyana bakaSirayeli, bazimisele intloko ibe nye, banyuke baphume kwelo zwe; kuba iya kuba nkulu imini yaseYizereli.

1.verse: Yithini kubazalwana benu, Wenani, bantu bam! nithi koodade benu, Wa, Menzelwa-mfesane! Bambanani nonyoko, bambanani naye;  kuba akamfazi wam, andindoda yakhe.

2.verse: Nize nitsho asuse ubuhenyu bakhe ebusweni bakhe, nokukrexeza kwakhe phakathi kwamabele akhe;

3.verse: hleze ndimhlube abe ze, ndimmise enjengamini wazalwa,  ndimenze abe njengentlango, ndimmise abe njengelizwe elingumqwebedu, ndimbulale ngenxano;

4.verse: ndingasikwa mfesane ngenxa yabantwana bakhe; kuba bengabantwana bobuhenyu bona.

5.verse: Kuba unina uhenyuzile, wenze okuziintloni umzali wabo;  ngokuba wathi, Ndiya kulandela izithandane zam, ezindinika isonka sam, namanzi am, uboya bam begusha neflakisi yam, ioli yam nento endiyiselayo.

6.verse: Ngako oko, yabona, ndiya kuyibiyela indlela yakho ngameva,  ndakhe udonga, angawufumani umendo wakhe.

7.verse: Uya kuzisukela izithandane zakhe, angafiki kuzo; azifune,  angazifumani: athi Ndiya kuya ndibuyele endodeni yam yokuqala,  kuba bekulungile kum oko kunangoku.

8.verse: Akazi ukuba ndim owamnikayo ingqolowa, newayini entsha,  neoli; ndamandisela isilivere negolide, abasuka bayenzela uBhahali.

9.verse: Ngako oko ndiya kubuya, ndiyithabathe ingqolowa yam ngexesha layo, newayini yam entsha ngexesha layo elimisiweyo;  ndibuhluthe uboya beegusha, neflakisi yam yokugubungela ubuze bakhe.

10.verse: Ngoku ke ndowatyhila amanye akhe emehlweni ezithandane zakhe, kungabikho bani umhlangulayo esandleni sam.

11.verse: Ndoluphelisa lonke uvuyo lwakhe, umthendeleko wakhe,  nokuthwasa kwenyanga kuye, neesabatha zakhe, namaxesha akhe onke amisiweyo.

12.verse: Ndiya kuyibharhisa imidiliya yakhe, nemikhiwane yakhe,  abesithi yena, Lutshedo lwam olu, endalunikwayo zizithandane zam; ndoyenza ibe lihlathi, idliwe ziinyamakazi zasendle.

13.verse: Ndomvelela ngenxa yemihla yooBhahali, abeqhumisela ngayo kubo; abezihombisa ngamagabha akhe empumlo, nesambalo sakhe;  abelandela izithandane zakhe, andilibale mna; utsho uYehova.

14.verse: Ngako oko, yabona, ndiya kumrhwebesha, ndimse entlango,  ndithethe kakuhle naye.

15.verse: Ndomnika izidiliya zakhe, zithabathele khona, nentili yeAkore ibe lisango lethemba, aphendule khona njengeemini zobuncinane bakhe, nanjengemini yokunyuka kwakhe, ephuma ezweni laseYiputa.

16.verse: Kuya kuthi ngaloo mini, utsho uYehova, undibize ngokuthi,  Ndoda yam; ungabi sandibiza ngokuthi, Bhahali wam.

17.verse: Ngokuba ndiya kuwasusa amagama ooBhahali emlonyeni wakhe,  bangabi sakhunjulwa ngamagama abo.

18.verse: Ngaloo mini ndobenzela umnqophiso namarhamncwa asendle,  neentaka zezulu, nezinambuzane zomhlaba; ndaphule isaphetha nekrele nemfazwe, ezo zinto zingabikho ezweni; ndibahlalise bekholosile.

19.verse: Ndokugana ube ngowam ngonaphakade, ndikugane ube ngowam ngobulungisa nangokusesikweni, nangenceba nangemfesane;

20.verse: ndikugane ube ngowam ngokuthembeka, umazi uYehova.

21.verse: Kuya kuthi ngaloo mini, ndiphendule, utsho uYehova; ndiya kuliphendula izulu, lona liphendule ihlabathi;

22.verse: ihlabathi liphendule ingqolowa, newayini entsha, neoli; ezo zinto ziphendule uYizereli.

23.verse: Ndozihlwayelela yena elizweni, ndimenzele imfesane uAkenzelwanga-mfesane; ndithi kuAsibantubam, Ungabantu bam; aze athi kum, UnguThixo wam.

1.verse: Wathi uYehova kum, Phinda, uye uthande umfazi, ethandwa nguwabo, ekrexeza; njengoko uYehova abathandayo oonyana bakaSirayeli, bebheka thixweni bambi nje, bethanda izicumba zeerasintyisi.

2.verse: Ndamthenga wangowam ngeshumi elinesihlanu lesilivere,  nehomere yerhasi, neleteke yerhasi.

3.verse: Ndathi kuye, Uze uhlalele mna imihla emininzi, ungahenyuzi,  ungabi wandoda yimbi; nam ndenjenjalo kuwe.

4.verse: Ngokuba oonyana bakaSirayeli baya kuhlala imihla emininzi bengenakumkani, bengenamthetheli, bengenambingelelo,  bengenasimiso samatye, bengenaefodi namilonde-khaya.

5.verse: Emveni koko baya kubuya oonyana bakaSirayeli, bamquqele uYehova uThixo wabo, noDavide ukumkani wabo; baye benkwantya kuYehova, nasekulungeni kwakhe ekupheleni kwemihla.

1.verse: Liveni ilizwi likaYehova, nyana bakaSirayeli; ngokuba uYehova ubambene nabemi belizwe eli; ngokuba kungekho nyaniso,  kungekho nceba, kungekho kwazi uThixo kweli lizwe.

2.verse: Kukushwabula, nokuxoka, nokuncinitha, nokuba, nokukrexeza;  bagqobhozile, igazi liphathelele kwigazi.

3.verse: Ngenxa yoko ilizwe lenza isijwili, zithokombisile zonke izinto ezimi kulo; izinto eziphilileyo zasendle, neentaka zezulu, kwaneentlanzi zolwandle, ziyasuswa.

4.verse: Kodwa makangabambani omnye nomnye, omnye makangamohlwayi omnye; abantu bakowenu banjengobambene nombingeleli.

5.verse: Wokhubeka emini, umprofeti enawe akhubeke ebusuku,  ndimtshabalalise unyoko.

6.verse: Bayatshabalala abantu bam kukuswela ukwazi; kuba wena ukucekisile ukwazi, ndiya kukucekisa, ukuba ungabi ngumbingeleli kum. Wawulibala umyalelo kaThixo wakho;  ndobalibala abantwana bakho nam.

7.verse: Okukhona bandileyo, kokukhona bonileyo kum; uzuko lwabo ndiya kulwananisa ngocukucezo.

8.verse: Badla idini lesono labantu bam; umphefumlo wabo bawuphakamisela ebugwenxeni babo.

9.verse: Kuya kuthi, njengoko banjalo abantu, abe njalo umbingeleli;  ndizivelele iindlela zakhe kuye, ndizibuyisele kuye iintlondi zakhe.

10.verse: Bodla bangahluthi; bahenyuze bangandi; ngokuba bekuyekile ukumphulaphula uYehova.

11.verse: Uhenyuzo, newayini, newayini entsha, ziwexula intliziyo.

12.verse: Abantu bam babuzisa kumthi wabo; nentonga yabo iyabaxelela;  ngokuba umoya wobuhenyu ubalahlekisile; bahenyuze bemka phantsi koThixo wabo.

13.verse: Babingelela ezincotsheni zeentaba, baqhumisele ezindulini phantsi kwemioki nemipopulari nemiterebhinti, kuba ulungile umthunzi wayo; ngenxa yoko ziyahenyuza iintombi zenu,  bayakrexeza oomolokazana benu.

14.verse: Andiyi kuzivelela iintombi zenu, ngokokuba zihenyuza;  noomolokazana benu, ngokokuba bekrexeza. Ngokuba nina ngokwenu nithi gu bucala namahenyukazi nibingelela namangawukazi; ngoko ke abantu abangaqondiyo baya kukhahleleka phantsi.

15.verse: Ukuba uyahenyuza, Sirayeli, makangazeki ityala uYuda;  musani ukuya eGiligali, ningenyuki niye eBhetaven, ningafungi nithi, Ehleli nje uYehova.

16.verse: Kuba uSirayeli uyinjubaqa, njengethokazi eliyinjubaqa;  ngoku uYehova uya kubalusela emphangalaleni, njengamatakane.

18.verse: Igabadele imithayi yabo; bahenyuza behenyuzile; ziluthande nzulu ucukucezo iingweletshetshe zabo.

19.verse: Umoya umbambile ngamaphiko awo; baya kudana yimibingelelo yabo.

1.verse: Kuveni oku, babingeleli, nibaze iindlebe, nina ndlu kaSirayeli; nani ndlu yokumkani, bekani iindlebe; ngokuba uze kuni umgwebo lo; kuba nisuke naba ngumgibe eMizpa, naba ngumnatha otwatyululweyo phezu kweTabhore.

2.verse: Bangxokile ukonakalisa ekunxaxheni kwabo; ke ndiyintethiso kubo bonke bephela.

3.verse: Mna ndiyamazi uEfrayim, noSirayeli akagushiwe kum; ngokuba uhenyuzile ngoku, wena Efrayim, uSirayeli uzenze inqambi.

4.verse: Izenzo zabo azivumi ukuba babuyele kuThixo wabo; kuba umoya wobuhenyu ukubo, abamazi uYehova.

5.verse: Iqhayiya likaSirayeli liyangqina ebusweni bakhe; bokhubeka ooSirayeli noEfrayim ngobugwenxa babo; wokhubeka nabo kwanoYuda.

6.verse: Baya kuya kumfuna uYehova, benempahla yabo emfutshane neenkomo zabo, bangamfumani; urhoxile kubo.

7.verse: Banginiza kuYehova, kuba bezele oonyana abangengabo; ngoku ke ukuthwasa kwenyanga kuyabadla, kunye nezahlulo zabo zomhlaba.

8.verse: Vuthelani izigodlo eGibheha, nexilongo eRama; wuhlabeni eBhetaven, nithi, Emva kwakho, Bhenjamin.

9.verse: Kuya kuba senkangala kwelakwaEfrayim ngemini yokohlwaya;  ezizweni zakwaSirayeli ndisazisile isimakade sesibetho.

10.verse: Abathetheli bakwaYuda basuka baba njengabashenxisi bomda;  ngoko ke ndophalaza phezu kwabo ubushushu bam njengamanzi.

11.verse: UEfrayim uyacudiswa, uyavikiveka ngumgwebo; kuba usuke wavuma ukulandela umthetho wabo.

12.verse: Mna ndinjengenundu kwaEfrayim, ndinjengombungu kwindlu kaYuda.

13.verse: Xa wasibonayo uEfrayim isifo sakhe, uYuda walibona inxeba lakhe; uEfrayim wesuka waya eAsiriya, wathumela kukumkani uYarebhi. Akaba nako ukuniphilisa, akaba nako ukuninceda kwinxeba lenu.

14.verse: Ngokuba ndinjengengonyama kwaEfrayim, ndinjengengonyama entsha kwindlu kaYuda mna; mna ndiyaqwenga ndimke, ndithimbe,  kungabikho mhlanguli.

15.verse: Ndiya kuhamba ndibuyele endaweni yam, bade beve benetyala,  babufune ubuso bam. Ekubandezelekeni kwabo baya kundifuna benyamekile; bathi:

1.verse: Yizani sibuyele kuYehova; kuba eqwengile, wosiphilisa;  uxabele, wosibopha.

2.verse: Wosidlisa ubomi, kwakuba ntsuku mbini; wosiphakamisa ngolwesithathu, sidle ubomi phambi kwakhe.

3.verse: Masikwazi ke, masikusukele ukumazi uYehova; ukuphuma kwakhe kuqinisekile njengokuphuma kwesifingo, ukuba eze kuthi njengemvula, njengemvula evuthisayo, elinyakamisayo ilizwe.

4.verse: Mandikuthini na, Efrayim? Mandikuthini na, Yuda? Uthando lwenu lunjengelifu lomso, lunjengombethe ophela kwakusasa.

5.verse: Ngenxa yoko ndibaxozile ngabaprofeti, ndababulala ngamazwi omlomo wam; ukuze umgwebo wam uphume njengokukhanya.

6.verse: Ngokuba ndinonelele uthando, andinonelele mbingelelo;  ndinonelele ukwazi uThixo, ngaphezu kwamadini anyukayo.

7.verse: Ke bona bawugqithile umnqophiso njengoAdam, banginiza kum apho.

8.verse: IGiliyadi ngumzi wabasebenzi bobutshinga; uzele yimikhondo yegazi.

9.verse: Bunjengokulalelwa kwendoda ngamatutu ubudlelane bababingeleli; bayancinitha endleleni eya kwaShekem, ewe, benze amanyala.

10.verse: Endlwini kaSirayeli ndibone into ebanga amanwele; apho uEfrayim uyahenyuza, uSirayeli uzenza inqambi.

11.verse: Kananjalo wena Yuda, umiselwe uvuno, ekukubuyiseni kwam ukuthinjwa kwabantu bam.

1.verse: Ekumphiliseni kwam uSirayeli, kusuke kutyhileke ubugwenxa bukaEfrayim nobubi bakwaSamari; kuba besebenza ubuxoki, isela lingene, amatutu abhunyule ngaphandle.

2.verse: Abatsho entliziyweni yabo ukuthi ndobukhumbula bonke ububi babo; ngoku zibangqongile iintlondi zabo, zabakho phambi kobuso bam.

3.verse: Bamvuyisile ukumkani ngeento zabo ezimbi, nabathetheli ngokuxoka kwabo.

4.verse: Bonke bephela bangabakrexezi; banjengeziko lezonka elibaselwe ngumoji-zonka, okha ayeke ukukhwezela, lo gama axovula intlama, ide ifukuke.

5.verse: Ngemini yokumkani wethu abathetheli bazixhayele isifo ngobushushu bewayini; uthabathene nabagxeki.

6.verse: Ngokuba bayisondeze intliziyo yabo emlaleni wabo, ngathi kusezikweni lezonka; bonke ubusuku ulele umoji-zonka wabo;  kusasa lona livutha njengomlilo olenyayo.

7.verse: Bonke bephela bashushu njengeziko lezonka, bayabadla abagwebi babo; bonke ookumkani babo bawile; akukho namnye kubo undinqulayo.

8.verse: UEfrayim yena uzekazekana nezizwe; uEfrayim uliqebengwana lesonka elingaguqulwanga.

9.verse: Abasemzini bawadlile amandla akhe, ukanti yena akazi;  nezimvi zithe saa kuye, noko akazi yena.

10.verse: Iqhayiya likaSirayeli liyangqina ebusweni bakhe; noko ababuyeli kuYehova uThixo wabo, abamfuni kuko konke oku.

11.verse: UEfrayim unjengevukuthu elimathileyo, elingenantliziyo;  babiza iYiputa, baya eAsiriya.

12.verse: Ndothi, bakubon ukuba bayaya, ndiwutwabulule phezu kwabo umnatha wam, ndibathobe njengeentaka zezulu; ndiya kubathethisa ngokweendaba endazivakalisayo ebandleni labo.

13.verse: Yeha ke bona! kuba babalekile kum. Yimbubho kubo! kuba bakreqile kum. Mna ngendibakhulule, basuka bona bathetha amanga ngam.

14.verse: Abakhalanga kum ngeentliziyo zabo, basuka bamana bebhomboloza ezililini zabo; baqukana ngenxa yengqolowa newayini entsha, baphambuka, bandichasa.

15.verse: Mna ndiziqeqeshile, ndazomeleza, iingalo zabo; ke bona bacinga ububi ngam.

16.verse: Bayabuya, kodwa ababuyeli phezulu; banjengesaphetha esityeketyeke. Baya kuwa likrele abathetheli babo, ngenxa yobhavumo lolwimi lwabo. Oko kukugculelwa kwabo ezweni laseYiputa.

1.verse: Beka isigodle emlonyeni wakho. Utshaba luyirhiwula indlu kaYehova njengexhalanga; ngenxa yokuba bewugqithile umnqophiso wam, bakreqa kumyalelo wam.

2.verse: Baya kukhala kum, bathi, Thixo wethu, siyakwazi, thina Sirayeli.

3.verse: Iyanuka kuSirayeli into elungileyo; utshaba malumsukele.

4.verse: Bamise ookumkani, bengaveli kum; benze abathetheli, ndingazi mna; isilivere yabo negolide yabo bayenze izithixo, ukuze inqanyulwe.

5.verse: Ithole lakho liyanuka, Samari: umsindo wam uyavutha kubo;  kunini na bengakwazi ukuziphatha msulwa?

6.verse: Ngokuba nalo elo liphuma kwaSirayeli; lenziwe yingcibi,  aliThixo lona; ke liya kucoleka ithole lakwaSamari.

7.verse: Ngokuba behlwayele umoya, baya kuvuna isaqhwithi. Akukho zimba kuwo; isithombo asenzi sikhwebu; nokuba besithe saba naso, besiya kudliwa ngabasemzini.

8.verse: Uginyiwe uSirayeli; ngoku basezintlangeni njengempahla engananziweyo.

9.verse: Kuba bona banyuke baya eAsiriya, njenge-esile lasendle lihamba lilodwa, lahlukile; ke yena uEfrayim uziqeshile izitharudane.

10.verse: Nakuba beqesha nokuqesha ezintlangeni, ndiya kubabutha ngoku, baqale banciphe ngenxa yomthwalo wokumkani wabathetheli.

11.verse: Kuba uEfrayim uzandisile izibingelelo zokona; kuye izibingelelo zaba zezokona.

12.verse: Ndimbhalela into eninzi yemiyalelo yam; bayicingela into engento.

13.verse: Imibingelelo yezipho zam bayayibingelela, bayidla ngokwenyama; ke ayakholeka kuYehova; ngokunje uya kubukhumbula ubugwenxa babo, azivelele izono zabo; baya kubuyela bona eYiputa.

14.verse: Kuba uSirayeli wamlibala uMenzi wakhe, wakha amabhotwe;  uYuda wayandisa imizi enqatyisiweyo. Ke mna ndiya kuthumela umlilo emizini yakhe, uzidle iingxande zakhe ezinde.

1.verse: Musa ukuvuya, Sirayeli, ude ugcobe njengezizwe: ngokuba uhenyuzile, wemka kuThixo wakho; uthande utshequ ezandeni zonke zengqolowa.

2.verse: Isanda nesixovulelo seoli asiyi kubondla, newayini entsha iya kunidanisa.

3.verse: Abayi kuhlala ezweni likaYehova; uEfrayim uya kubuyela eYiputa, badle izinto eziyinqambi eAsiriya.

4.verse: Abayi kumthululela uYehova iwayini, ayiyi kuba mnandi kuye nemibingelelo yabo; ukudla kwabo kubo kuya kuba njengesonka sabalilayo. Bonke abakudlayo baya kuba ziinqambi; ngokuba ukudla kwabo kuya kuba kokwabo, akuyi kungena endlwini kaYehova.

5.verse: Nothini na ngemini yexesha elimisiweyo, nangemini yomthendeleko kaYehova?

6.verse: Kuba, yabonani, bemkile ngenxa yembuqo; iYiputa iya kubabutha, iMofi iya kubangcwaba; izinto zabo ezinqwenelekayo zesilivere ziya kuhluthwa ngamarhawu; yimithi enameva ezintenteni zabo.

7.verse: Kufike iimini zokuvelela, kufike iimini zempindezelo; uya kwazi uSirayeli. Umprofeti sisimathane, ngumbhudi indoda enomoya, ngenxa yobukhulu bobugwenxa bakho nokutshutshisa okuninzi.

8.verse: Ngumboniseli uEfrayim ngakuThixo wam; umprofeti ngumgibe womthiyeli ezindleleni zakhe zonke, uyintshutshiso endlwini yoThixo wakhe.

9.verse: Batshonisile ukonakalisa kwabo, njengokwemihla yaseGibheha;  uya kubukhumbula ubugwenxa babo, uya kuzivelela izono zabo.

10.verse: Ndamfumana uSirayeli enjengeediliya entlango; ndababona ooyihlo benjengamakhiwane aqalelayo emkhiwaneni, ekuqaleni kwawo; basuka bona baya kuBhahali-pehore, bazahlulela entweni eziintloni, baba yinto enezothe, njengesithandane sabo.

11.verse: UEfrayim, uzuko lwakhe luya kubaleka, lumke njengentaka;  kungabikho kuzala, nakumitha, nakukhawula.

12.verse: Ewe, nokuba bathe bakhulisa oonyana, ndobahlutha abantwana,  kungabikho luntu. Yeha ke bona, ekusukeni kwam kubo!

13.verse: Ngoko ndazibonela uEfrayim, ukuba abe yiTire, etyelwe ekriweni; kodwa uEfrayim uya kubakhuphela kumbulali oonyana bakhe.

14.verse: Banike, Yehova; wobanika ntoni na? Banike isisu esiphumayo,  namabele awomileyo.

15.verse: Bonke ububi babo buseGiligali; kuba ndaqala ukubathiya khona. Ngenxa yobubi beentlondi zabo, ndiya kubagxotha endlwini yam; andiyi kuphinda ndibathande; bonke abathetheli babo baziinjubaqa.

16.verse: Ubethiwe uEfrayim, ingcambu yabo yomile; abayi kuxakatha siqhamo. Nokuba bathe bazala, ndozibulala izinto ezinqwenelekayo zesisu sabo.

17.verse: UThixo wam uya kubacekisa, kuba bengamphulaphulanga; baya kuphalaphala ezintlangeni.

1.verse: USirayeli ngumdiliya onabileyo; wazixakathela iziqhamo.  Okukhona waba neziqhamo, kokukhona wandisa izibingelelo;  okukhona lalungayo ilizwe lakhe, kokukhona walungisa izimiso zamatye.

2.verse: Yaba buthelezi intliziyo yabo; ngoku baya kuva benetyala.  Uya kuziqhekeza izibingelelo zabo, azibhuqe izimiso zabo zamatye.

3.verse: Ewe, ngoku baya kuthi, Asinakumkani; kuba asimoyikanga uYehova; nokumkani lowa, uya kusenzela ntoni na?

4.verse: Bathetha amazwi nje, bashwabula ngenkohlakalo, benza iminqophiso; kwahluma okusesikweni, njengobuhlungu emiqeleni yesisimi.

5.verse: Abemi bakwaSamari banxunguphele ngomfanekiso wethole laseBhetaven; ewe, benza isijwili ngalo abantu balo,  bathuthumele ababingeleli balo abangengabo, ngenxa yalo, ngenxa yozuko lwalo, kuba lufudukile kulo.

6.verse: Liya kusiwa eAsiriya nalo, libe ngumnikelo kukumkani uYarebhi; uEfrayim uya kubanjwa kukudana, adane uSirayeli ngenxa yecebo lakhe.

7.verse: Ke elakwaSamari, ukumkani walo udakile, unjengeceba phezu kwamanzi.

8.verse: Iziganga zaseAven, isono sikaSirayeli, zotshabalala. Kuya kuhluma imithana enameva neenkunzana ezibingelelweni zabo; baya kuthi kwiintaba, Siseleleni; nakwiinduli, Siweleni.

9.verse: Kususela kwimihla yaseGibheha, Sirayeli wona; bahlala khona; akubafikelanga eGibheha ukulwa noonyana bobugqwetha.

10.verse: Ndiya kubathethisa ke ngokomnqweno wam, zibahlanganyele zonke izizwe, ekubotshelelweni kwabo ebugwenxeni babo bobubini.

11.verse: UEfrayim lithokazi eliqeqeshiweyo, elithanda ukubhula; mna ke ndibeke idyokhwe entanyeni yalo entle. Ndiyamtsalisa uEfrayim; uYuda uya kulima; uYakobi uya kuziqwakanisela.

12.verse: Zihlwayeleleni, ukuba kuvele ubulungisa; vunani ngokwenceba; zikhubeleleni umkhubelo, ekubeni ilixesha lokumquqela uYehova, ade afike aninisele ubulungisa.

13.verse: Nalima okungendawo, navuna ubugqwetha, nadla iziqhamo zobuxoki; kuba wakholosa ngendlela yakho, ngobuninzi bamagorha akho.

14.verse: Kuya kuvuka ingxolo phakathi kwezizwe zakowenu, zibhuqwe neenqaba zakho zonke, njengoko uShaleman wayibhuqayo iBhete-arbhele ngemini yemfazwe; kwacunyuzwa oonina kunye noonyana.

15.verse: Iya kwenjenjalo kuni iBheteli, ngenxa yobubi bezinto zenu ezimbi; kwangesifingo uya kusingelwa phantsi aphele ukumkani wakwaSirayeli.

1.verse: Oko uSirayeli ebemncinane, ndamthanda, ndambiza unyana wam ukuba aphume eYiputa.

2.verse: Bababiza, kwaba kukhona bemkayo ebusweni babo; babingelela kooBhahali, baqhumisela kwimifanekiso eqingqiweyo.

3.verse: Mna ke ndamfundisa uEfrayim ukuhamba, ndibaphatha ngeengalo zam; abazanga noko, ukuba ndabaphilisa.

4.verse: Ndabatsala ngezintya zomntu, ngeentsontelo zothando; kubo ndaba njengomnyinyisi wedyokhwe emihlathini yabo, ndathantamisa ukumnika ukudla.

5.verse: Akayi kubuyela ezweni laseYiputa; nguAsiriya ukumkani wakhe; kuba abavumanga ukubuya.

6.verse: Ikrele liya kuyijikeleza imizi yakhe, liyigqibele imivalo yakhe, liyidle, ngenxa yamacebo abo.

7.verse: Abantu bam baphikele ukubuya umva kum; nakuba bebizelwa phezulu, abaziphakamisi mpela.

8.verse: Ndingathini na ukukulahla, Efrayim? ndikuncame, Sirayeli?  Ndingathini na ukukulahla njengeAdama, ndikwenze ube njengeTsebhoyim? Intliziyo yam iphethukile phakathi kwam,  ububele bam buvuthile kunye.

9.verse: Andiyi kukwenza ukuvutha komsindo wam, andiyi kubuya ndimonakalise uEfrayim; ngokuba ndinguThixo, andimntu;  ndingoyiNgcwele phakathi kwakho; andizi ndishushu ngamsindo.

10.verse: Baya kumlandela uYehova; uya kubharhula njengengonyama;  kuba yena uya kubharhula, bavele entshonalanga oonyana,  begubha.

11.verse: Baya kuvela eYiputa, begubha njengeentaka, bavele ezweni laseAsiriya njengamavukuthu, ndibabeke ezindlwini zabo; utsho uYehova.

12.verse: UEfrayim undirhawule ngobuxoki, indlu kaSirayeli ngenkohliso; noYuda usengumqhathu kuThixo, koyiNgcwele,  onyanisileyo.

1.verse: UEfrayim wasukelana nomoya; usukela ulophu lwasempumalanga.  Imini yonke wandisa amanga nembuqo: banqophisana neAsiriya,  kusiwa ioli eYiputa.

2.verse: UYehova ubambene noYuda, umvelela uYakobi ngokweendlela zakhe; uya kumbuyisela ngokweentlondi zakhe.

3.verse: Esizalweni wambamba umkhuluwa wakhe ngesithende, ekuqineni kwakhe wazamana noThixo.

4.verse: Wazamana naso isithunywa, wafeza, walila, watarhuzisa kuso;  samfumana eBheteli, apho ke sasithetha nathi.

5.verse: UYehova, uThixo wemikhosi, uYehova sisikhumbuzo sakhe.

6.verse: Wena ke, buyela kuThixo wakho; gcina inceba nokusesikweni,  uhlale uthembele kuThixo wakho.

7.verse: Ungumrhwebi ophethe isikali senkohliso, uthanda ukucudisa.

8.verse: Wathi uEfrayim, Noko ndisisityebi, ndizifumanele ubutyebi;  yonke imigushanxa yam ayindizuzisanga bugwenxa busisono.

9.verse: Kanti mna ndinguYehova, uThixo wakho nje, kwasezweni laseYiputa; ndisaya kukubeka ezintenteni, njengokwemihla yomthendeleko.

10.verse: Ndithethe kubaprofeti, ndandisa imibono mna, ndenza imizekeliso ngezandla zabaprofeti.

11.verse: Ukuba iGiliyadi ilishinitshini, yoba yinto engento kuphela. Babingelela iinkomo eGiligali; izibingelelo zabo nazo zoba njengeemfumba zamatye emiqeleni yesisimi.

12.verse: UYakobi wabalekela ezweni lakwa-Aram, uSirayeli wakhonza ngenxa yomfazi, wagcina imihlambi ngenxa yomfazi.

13.verse: UYehova wamnyusa uSirayeli eYiputa ngomprofeti ke,  wagcinwa ngomprofeti ke.

14.verse: UEfrayim uqumbise kakrakra; iNkosi yakhe iya kuwaphosa amagazi akhe phezu kwakhe, isibuyisele kuye isingcikivo sakhe.

1.verse: Wathi akuthetha uEfrayim, kwabakho ukothuka; waphakama yena kwaSirayeli, wesuka wazeka ityala ngoBhahali, wafa.

2.verse: Ngoku bongeza ukona, bazenzela imifanekiso etyhidiweyo ngesilivere yabo, bazenzela izithixo njengokuqonda kwabo;  ingumsebenzi weengcibi wonke uphela; ababingelelayo baseluntwini, bathi ngayo, bawanga amathole.

3.verse: Ngako oko baya kuba njengelifu lomso, nanjengombethe ophela kwakusasa, njengomququ ophetshethwa sisaqhwithi esandeni,  nanjengomsi ophuma ngekroba.

4.verse: Kanti mna ndinguYehova uThixo wakho, kwasezweni laseYiputa;  akuyi kwazi thixo ungendim; akukho namnye umsindisi ngaphandle kwam.

6.verse: Bathi bakudliswa, bahlutha; bakuhlutha, yaphakama intliziyo yabo; ngenxa yoko bandilibele.

7.verse: Ngoko ndaba njengengonyama kubo, ndabalalela njengengwe endleleni.

8.verse: Ndothi gaga kubo njengebhere ehluthwe amathole ayo,  ndiwukrazule umhlehlo wentliziyo yabo, ndibadle khona njengengonyamakazi; amarhamncwa asendle aya kubadlavula.

9.verse: Uzonakalisile, Sirayeli, ngokundichasa kwakho, mna luncedo lwakho.

10.verse: Uphi na ngoku ukumkani wakho, ukuba angakusindisi emizini yakho yonke? Baphi na ngokunje abagwebi bakho abo, wathi,  Ndinike ukumkani nabathetheli?

11.verse: Ndikunika ookumkani ndinomsindo, ndibathabathe ngokuphuphuma kwawo.

12.verse: Bubotshiwe ngengxowa ubugwenxa bukaEfrayim, sibekiwe isono sakhe.

13.verse: Inimba yozalayo iyamzela; ungunyana ongenabulumko, kuba engaveli ngexesha elililo emlonyeni wesizalo.

14.verse: Ndiya kubakhulula esandleni selabafileyo, ndiya kubahlawulela ndibakhulule ekufeni. Ziphi na iindyikitya zakho,  kufa? Iphi na imbubhiso yakho, ngcwaba? Ukuzohlwaya kusithele emehlweni am.

15.verse: Nokuba yena uya kuba neziqhamo phakathi kwabazalwana bakhe, kuya kuza ulophu lwasempumalanga, umoya kaYehova unyuka entlango, litshe ithende lakhe, wome umthombo wakhe; lowo uya kuphanga ubuncwane beempahla zonke ezinqwenelekayo.

16.verse: ElakwaSamari liya kuziva linetyala, kuba liphikise uThixo walo. Baya kuwa likrele, iintsana zabo zicunyuzwe, nabamithiyo babo baqangqululwe.

1.verse: Sirayeli, buya, uze kuYehova, uThixo wakho; ngokuba ukhubekile ngobugwenxa bakho.

2.verse: Thabathani niphathe amazwi, nibuyele kuYehova; yithini kuye, Sixolele bonke ubugwenxa, wamkele izinto zethu ezilungileyo, ukuze sinikele iinkunzi zeenkomo ezintsha,  imibulelo yomlomo wethu.

3.verse: UAsiriya akayi kusisindisa, asiyi kukhwela emahasheni,  asiyi kuba sathi kumsebenzi wezandla zethu, Thixo wethu; kuba kuwe inkedama ifumana imfesane.

4.verse: Ndiya kukuphilisa ukubuya kwabo umva, ndiya kubathanda ngesisa; ngokuba umsindo wam ubuyile kuye.

5.verse: Ndiya kuba njengombethe kuSirayeli; uya kutyatyamba njengenyibiba, endelisele iingcambu zakhe njengeLebhanon.

6.verse: Aya kunaba amasebe akhe, bube njengomnquma ubuhle bakhe,  ivumba lakhe libe njengeLebhanon.

7.verse: Baya kubuya abahlala emthunzini wakhe, baphile njengengqolowa, batyatyambe njengomdiliya, isikhumbuzo sawo sibe njengewayini yaseLebhanon.

8.verse: Efrayim, yintoni na esenam nezithixo? Okwam ndiyamphendula,  ndimkhathalela; ndinjengomsipres oluhlaza, siyafunyanwa kum isiqhamo sakho.

9.verse: Ngubani na olumkileyo, aziqonde ezo zinto? Ngubani na onengqondo, azazi? Ngokuba zithe tye iindlela zikaYehova;  ahamba ngazo amalungisa; ke bona abakreqi baya kukhubeka kuzo.
